name: Early Access Golf
description:
Welcome to Sloam's Golf Course! We have over ONE (1) active level available RIGHT NOW for you to enjoy. Indulge yourself in the sweet pleasure of a single golf course as you wait for the whole release of the game. Don't worry about all the money you paid for the game, consider it an investment for all the possible future content, and be the first to experience golf in a never-before seen way: INCOMPLETE!

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Topic: Joined together, by a team of two: Reibax for the coding, and MightySalmon on the 3D, 2D and concept.
